section.name: Overview
section.p: This e-mail endpoint is an endpoint for the SMTP internet mail system. With this endpoint, a workflow can:

ol.li: send an e-mail and block until a reply is received
start a new conversation when a new e-mail is received

section.p: This endpoint is implemented by using JavaMail. Out-going e-mails are sent by talking to a SMTP server. Incoming e-mails can be fetched from various sources, such as POP3, IMAP4, and the Maildir format. All of them are fetched by polling.
See javadoc and Hangman sample for more details.

section.name: Configuring End-point
section.p: This endpoint requires you to configure a few settings through the constructor parameters. There are a large number of other configurations, such as the SMTP server name, that are exposed from JavaMail.
